name: infinity-xos-mcp-omni-hub
description: Omni-Directional Hub v3.0 - 58 Tools with Soft Guardrails & Maximum Connectivity
summary: Comprehensive multi-system integration: Orchestrator (1) + GitHub (3) + Docker (10) + Intelligence (2) + Google Suite (41 tools across Workspace, Cloud, Maps, AI/ML, Security)

governance_framework.philosophy: Soft guardrails with rate limiting, audit logging, and recursive connectivity
governance_framework.critical_operations: 10 per hour (Cloud Run deploy/delete, user suspension)
governance_framework.high_operations: 100 per minute (data writes, emails, storage operations)
governance_framework.medium_operations: Standard rate limit (calendar, events, API calls)
governance_framework.audit_logging: All operations logged with timestamp, governance level, and execution result

features.governance: Soft guardrails with rate limiting (token bucket algorithm)
features.error_handling: Comprehensive exception handling with recovery strategies
features.audit_logging: All operations logged with governance level and timestamp
features.recursive_connectivity: All 58 tools can invoke each other through MCP protocol
features.external_integration: Compatible with other MCP servers for federated ecosystems
features.complexity_optimization: Simplified error paths, optimized credential management, minimal dependencies
